author: legofan666666
title: look! no hands!
review:
The only problem i have with this set, is that the snowman has no hands! Although it has no hands, it is a neat little set. The buttons on the snowman are pretty cool on both sides of the snowman. It would have been nice if LEGO had covered the hole in the hat, but thats OK. The stand is a nice addition and a  good idea, making it possible for the snowman to stand up.

This is a cool little set for 5.00$(US)and i bought about three of them
